projects.title: Recipe Reservoir
projects.description: Final group project (Team Toonts), from 'Foundations of Software Development' at Code Fellows. A digital place to store recipes with ingredients, instructions, and ratin, and access them with a search. My primary contributions were the majority of the CSS styling, and implementing the rating functionality.

projects.title: Odd Duck Products
projects.description: A tool to evaluate user preference of a variety of 'odd' products. Click on your favorite product to vote, and view results at the end!

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: My first project utilizing the DOM. 'My good friend Pat' wants to combine two Seattle icons - Salmon and Cookies! You can even start your own Salmon Cookies franchise!
